name: Highway Speed Bike Racer
description:
That lets you drive past cars and trucks at amazingly fast speeds on your motorcycle. Dodge traffic, increase your speed and score in this fast, real racing challenge!

Highway Speed Bike Racer is one of the most exciting racing games. Drive a motor bike and avoid traffic cars and trucks while increasing speed to the limits. You can drive on a two- or single way road. While dodging traffic on a high speeds you gain money and you can purchase other better and faster bikes.

Authentic 3D physics and feel good graphics with amazing sound effects in this bike games for boys .Highway Speed Bike Racer is the most addictive super-bike racing game specially designed in motor world bike factory for the furious spider the heroes city stunt bike riders to boost their highway stunt bike simulation skills. Experience extreme trial Bike Racing with Bike Master.

Highway Speed Bike Racer: FEATURES:

Drive in Fast Racing Games
Fast boosts reach crazy speed!
Awesome and Enjoyable Graphics

Hope you'll enjoy this crazy and amazing game for kids and adults as well. If you like this Highway Speed Bike Racer, please try our other games by clicking “More from Developer” or by visiting our publisher account and don’t forget to rate and review.
Please comment below your feature requests and favorite features! We will continue to update the app with more content and features.
